text: hi! i'm a bit confused and trying to find the value for "hs_line_item_currency_code." i don't see any value in the deal line item section under "currency," but i have a custom code that needs that value, and it's not receiving it anymore. i'm trying to figure out where this field pulls its value from. does anyone know? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/objects/line-items>
<@U05BC4T17T4>  - There is a View API details option when viewing the association label in the UI
